    level="1"

>
[Specialized Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=344) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=332)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized. Your animal companion gains one [specialization](/animal-companions/specialized) of your choice.

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your companion.
name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
